TopicTitle: Empty/Fill all fuel tanks at once in VAB/SPH! (dynamic COM display.)

Articles.Content: This is a leftover from KSP1 issues. If you have large parts counts, which this game seems like it will have more of, you need the ability to empty and fill all tanks at once to see the different positions of the center of mass etc at it moves. Especially if you try to do something more complicated. Or some equivilent. Like showing the range of positions of the COM etc. But I would prefer all of the above. You can't have enough means to design the plane.

This is a good idea. It goes hand-in-hand with tank grouping (for easy fuel transfers).
